title: Whispers Of Autumn
description: Can You Find Love In The Afterlife?We live with this notion that when you die, you move on to a better place. The evil of the world is behind us. The ones we leave behind will mourn and we will always be with them. Itâ€™s believed ghosts are just lost souls refusing to move on. But is that really true?What happens if you die before your time?For Autumn Milley, the day she died started out like any normal day. She argued with her mother, went to school, and started her nightly jog. Her life was full of possibilities of the future, and then it ended in a flash.Greeted by two other souls, Ty and Sandy, she learns to navigate her way through the afterlife and all the evil it holds.Even in those she believes are friends.
author: Jo Cattell
